name: Terrific Halloween 2020
description:
A Halloween themed mini-game created as a casual side project for October 2020

You play as a pumpkin. Use WASD to roll around, and space to jump.

You will find yourself in a dark and moodily lit forest area that has been converted into some sort of pumpkin patch. Complete the somewhat tedious challenges to finish the mini-game, or just roll around until you get bored.

A shadow will appear and wander the area. If it catches you, you will lose all your progress. If you take too long, more shadows will appear.

Apologies for the file size, it is definitely not proportional to the amount of gameplay provided.
